entry.title: 0.8.1 ideas
entry.summary: On March 13, 2013, Gregory Maxwell expressed his concerns over derailing discussions on fixing things with other controversial changes. Peter Todd proposed considering the idea of increasing the block size limit to 2 MB within 2-3 years. However, Maxwell suggested scrapping the idea if it turned out to be controversial. Luke-jr was asked to revise his proposal to narrow the scope to things that didn't require serious debate. Luke-jr clarified that his proposal was only meant to start the conversation and expected the final decision to be substantially different.
